title: Inkscapetober Day 24: Extinct
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Inkscapetober Day 24:** Extinct
**Author:** [[*user SleepOfReason]]
Check out more art [[[SleepOfReason creates art| here]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]


[[=image WarFang.png]]


**Subject:** WarFang

**Commentary:** This shield refers to the name WarFang. On the vertical line we see three leopard heads, fangs included. Depicting the concept of war on a shield was a little more difficult, but I finally settled on using two British soldiers. The supporters are taken from the former coat of arms of Northern Ireland, reflecting WarFang's origin.

**How the prompt fits in:** The prompt Extinct does not refer to WarFang, fortunately. It refers to the supporter to the right. This is an Irish elk, a very large species of deer that went extinct in the late Pleistocene.

@@ @@
